Suitable areas
```{r}
# Overlay all layers
# Note: they all need to have the same extent and resolution
suitable <- overlay(sst_binary_min, sst_binary_max, depth_binary,current_binary,  fun = function(w,x,y,z){w+x+y+\z})

# Plot suitable areas
plot(suitable)
map('world', fill = T, add = T, col = 'gray')

```
